column5: Welcome to Bishop Arts in the heart of Oak Cliff. Great duplex apartment located close to restaurants, downtown,and major highways. We are so close to Bishop Arts District it is a minute walk. Bishop Arts offers shopping, restaurants, bars, and galleries. Apartment has hardwood floors, open kitchen floor plan, granite counter tops in kitchen. Close to Trinity Groves, Uptown, American Airlines Center, Dallas Zoo, Perot Museum, Convention Center, Union Station, and Design District.
column8: Private Duplex in Bishop Arts *Near Everything*
